narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. 
Note: Since the last inspection, no further surgical procedures were performed at the facility involving either
paralytics or paralytics with cardiac bypass as cited on the inspection report signed 5 November 2014.
 
An exit briefing was conducted with facility Attending Veterinarian and facility Vice President.
Additional Inspectors
Geib Mary, Veterinary Medical Officer
